name: T10_invisibility_wand
prompt: Create a magic wand called 'Invisibility Wand' that makes the player invisible when used

visual_expectations.description: The player holding a wand. When used, the player model should become translucent or disappear.

verify.code: () => { const items = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.itemFactory.itemTypes; const wand = Object.values(items).find(i => i.name.toLowerCase().includes('invis')); if (!wand) return { success: false, message: 'Invisibility Wand item not found' }; return { success: true, message: `Found wand: ${wand.name}` }; }

() => { if(window.__VOXEL_GAME__.player.mesh.visible === false || window.__VOXEL_GAME__.player.mesh.material.opacity < 1) return { success: true, message: 'Player is invisible/translucent' }; return { success: false, message: 'Player is still fully visible' }; }
